name: src/js/defaults.js
src/js/event.js
src/js/middleware.js
src/js/utils/format-time.js
formatTime
description:
Format seconds as a duration string.

Either formatted as:

- DD:HH:MM:SS (> 24 hours)
- HH:MM:SS (> 1 hour)
- MM:SS:MSS (`displayMilliseconds = true`)
- MM:SS (`displayMilliseconds = false`)

Supplying a guide (in seconds) will force a number of leading zeros
to cover the length of the guide.

params.name: seconds
params.description:
Number of seconds to be turned into a
    string.

params.name: guide
params.description: Number (in seconds) to model the string after.

params.name: displayMilliseconds
params.description: Display milliseconds or not.

name: src/js/utils/log.js
log
description: Log message (if the debug option is enabled).

params.name: args
params.description:
The arguments to be passed to the matching console
    method.

params.name: logType
params.description: The name of the console method to use.

params.name: debug
params.description: Whether or not the debug option is enabled or not.

name: src/js/videojs.wavesurfer.js
Wavesurfer
description: Draw a waveform for audio and video files in a video.js player.

name: constructor
description: The constructor function for the class.

params.name: player
params.description: video.js Player object.

params.name: options
params.description: Player options.

name: initialize
description: Player UI is ready: customize controls.

name: parseOptions
description: Initializes the waveform options.

params.name: surferOpts
params.description: Plugin options.

name: setupPlaybackEvents
description: Starts or stops listening to events related to audio-playback.

params.name: enable
params.description:
Start or stop listening to playback
    related events.

name: load
description: Start loading waveform data.

params.name: url
params.description:
Either the URL of the audio file,
    a Blob or a File object.

params.name: peaks
params.description:
Either the URL of peaks
    data for the audio file, or an array with peaks data.

name: loadPeaks
description: Start loading waveform data.

params.name: url
params.description:
Either the URL of the audio file,
    a Blob or a File object.

params.name: peaks
params.description:
Either the URL of peaks
    data for the audio file, or an array with peaks data.

name: play
description: Start/resume playback or microphone.

name: pause
description: Pauses playback or microphone visualization.

name: isDestroyed
description: Indicates whether the plugin is destroyed or not.

name: destroy
description: Remove the player and waveform.

name: setVolume
description: Set the volume level.

params.name: volume
params.description: The new volume level.

name: exportImage
description:
Save waveform image as data URI.

The default format is `'image/png'`. Other supported types are
`'image/jpeg'` and `'image/webp'`.

params.name: format
params.description:
A string indicating the image format.
The default format type is `'image/png'`.

params.name: quality
params.description:
A number between 0 and 1 indicating the image
quality to use for image formats that use lossy compression such as
`'image/jpeg'`` and `'image/webp'`.

params.name: type
params.description:
Image data type to return. Either 'blob' (default)
or 'dataURL'.

return.description:
When using `'dataURL'` `type` this returns
a single data URL or an array of data URLs, one for each canvas. The `'blob'`
`type` returns a `Promise` resolving with an array of `Blob` instances, one
for each canvas.

name: setAudioOutput
description: Change the audio output device.

params.name: deviceId
params.description: Id of audio output device.

name: getCurrentTime
description:
Get the current time (in seconds) of the stream during playback.

Returns 0 if no stream is available (yet).

name: setCurrentTime
description: Updates the player's element displaying the current time.

params.name: currentTime
params.description:
Current position of the playhead
    (in seconds).

params.name: duration
params.description: Duration of the waveform (in seconds).

name: getDuration
description:
Get the duration of the stream in seconds.

Returns 0 if no stream is available (yet).

name: setDuration
description: Updates the player's element displaying the duration time.

params.name: duration
params.description: Duration of the waveform (in seconds).

name: onWaveReady
description: Audio is loaded, decoded and the waveform is drawn.

name: onWaveFinish
description: Fires when audio playback completed.

name: onWaveProgress
description: Fires continuously during audio playback.

params.name: time
params.description: Current time/location of the playhead.

name: onWaveSeek
description: Fires during seeking of the waveform.

name: onWaveError
description: Waveform error.

params.name: error
params.description: The wavesurfer error.

name: onPlayToggle
description: Fired when the play toggle is clicked.

name: onVolumeChange
description: Fired when the volume in the video.js player changes.

name: onScreenChange
description: Fired when the video.js player switches in or out of fullscreen mode.

name: redrawWaveform
description: Redraw waveform.

params.name: newWidth
params.description: New width for the waveform.

params.name: newHeight
params.description: New height for the waveform.

name: log
description: Log message to console (if the debug option is enabled).

params.name: args
params.description:
The arguments to be passed to the matching console
    method.

params.name: logType
params.description: The name of the console method to use.

name: setFormatTime
description: Replaces the default `formatTime` implementation with a custom implementation.

params.name: customImplementation
params.description:
A function which will be used in place
    of the default `formatTime` implementation. Will receive the current time
    in seconds and the guide (in seconds) as arguments.

content:
videojs-wavesurfer
==================

A [video.js](https://www.videojs.com/) plugin that adds a navigable waveform
for audio and video files, using the [wavesurfer.js](https://github.com/katspaugh/wavesurfer.js)
library. Includes support for fullscreen mode and [real-time visualization of microphone
input](https://collab-project.github.io/videojs-wavesurfer/#/microphone).

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/collab-project/videojs-wavesurfer/master/docs/img/screenshot.png?raw=true "Screenshot")

[![npm version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/videojs-wavesurfer.svg?style=flat)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/videojs-wavesurfer)
[![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/videojs-wavesurfer.svg)](https://github.com/collab-project/videojs-wavesurfer/releases)
[![License](https://img.shields.io/npm/l/videojs-wavesurfer.svg)](LICENSE)
[![Build Status](https://github.com/collab-project/videojs-wavesurfer/workflows/videojs-wavesurfer/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://github.com/collab-project/videojs-wavesurfer/actions?workflow=videojs-wavesurfer)
[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/collab-project/videojs-wavesurfer/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/collab-project/videojs-wavesurfer?branch=master)
![Size](https://img.shields.io/bundlephobia/minzip/videojs-wavesurfer.svg?style=flat)
![Stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/collab-project/videojs-wavesurfer.svg?style=social)

## Documentation

The documentation and examples can be found on: https://collab-project.github.io/videojs-wavesurfer

## License

This work is licensed under the [MIT License](LICENSE).
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "videojs-wavesurfer",
  "version": "3.10.0",
  "description": "video.js plugin that adds a navigable waveform for audio and video files.",
  "author": "Collab",
  "license": "MIT",
  "readmeFilename": "README.md",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/collab-project/videojs-wavesurfer/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/collab-project/videojs-wavesurfer",
  "main": "dist/videojs.wavesurfer.js",
  "style": "dist/css/videojs.wavesurfer.css",
  "sass": "src/css/videojs.wavesurfer.scss",
  "directories": {
    "docs": "./docs",
    "lib": "./src",
    "example": "./examples",
    "test": "./test"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/collab-project/videojs-wavesurfer.git"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "clean": "rimraf dist",
    "build": "npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build:dev && npm run build:min",
    "build:dev": "webpack --config ./build-config/webpack.dev.main.js",
    "build:min": "webpack --config ./build-config/webpack.prod.main.js",
    "docs": "npm-run-all docs:*",
    "docs:api": "rimraf docs/api && esdoc",
    "lint": "npm-run-all lint:*",
    "lint:js": "eslint src/js test build-config",
    "lint:html": "htmlhint examples docs/demo",
    "start": "npm run build && webpack serve --config ./build-config/webpack.dev.main.js",
    "start-doc": "docsify serve docs",
    "test": "karma start karma.conf.js",
    "prepublishOnly": "not-in-install && npm run build || in-install"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist/",
    "src/"
  ],
  "keywords": [
    "waveform",
    "audio",
    "video",
    "wavesurfer",
    "videojs",
    "videojs-plugin",
    "player"
  ],
  "dependencies": {
    "video.js": ">=7.0.5",
    "wavesurfer.js": ">=6.3.0 <7.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.23.9",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.23.9",
    "@babel/register": "^7.23.7",
    "@chiragrupani/karma-chromium-edge-launcher": "^2.3.1",
    "@jsdevtools/host-environment": "^2.1.2",
    "@jsdevtools/karma-host-environment": "^3.0.3",
    "add-zero": "^1.0.0",
    "babel-loader": "^9.1.3",
    "babel-plugin-add-module-exports": "^1.0.4",
    "babel-plugin-istanbul": "^6.1.1",
    "browserslist": "^4.22.3",
    "css-loader": "^6.10.0",
    "css-minimizer-webpack-plugin": "^6.0.0",
    "date-fns": "^3.3.1",
    "docsify-cli": "^4.4.4",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^8.56.0",
    "htmlhint": "^1.1.4",
    "in-publish": "^2.0.1",
    "jasmine-core": "^5.1.2",
    "karma": "^6.4.2",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "^3.2.0",
    "karma-coverage": "^2.2.1",
    "karma-detect-browsers": "^2.3.3",
    "karma-firefox-launcher": "^2.1.2",
    "karma-jasmine": "^5.1.0",
    "karma-jasmine-matchers": "^5.0.0",
    "karma-verbose-reporter": "0.0.8",
    "karma-webpack": "^5.0.1",
    "mini-css-extract-plugin": "^2.8.0",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.5",
    "parse-ms": "^4.0.0",
    "replace-in-file": "^7.1.0",
    "rimraf": "^5.0.5",
    "sass": "^1.70.0",
    "sass-loader": "^14.1.0",
    "style-loader": "^3.3.4",
    "webpack": "^5.90.1",
    "webpack-cli": "^5.1.4",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^5.0.1",
    "webpack-merge": "^5.10.0",
    "webpack-remove-empty-scripts": "^1.0.4",
    "webrtc-adapter": "^8.2.3"
  }
}
name: package.json
